paper_abstract: This letter investigates convergence theorems of a DHNN with delay. We present one generalized updating rule for serial mode. The condition for convergence of a DHNN without delay can be relaxed from a symmetric matrix to a quasi-symmetric matrix. One application is presented to demonstrate the higher convergence speed of our algorithm. (C) 2007 Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: Stability analysis of a discrete Hopfield neural network with delay
